00321   template <class T> class TField : public Field {
00322 public:
00323 
00330     TField ( FLDID32 fid ) {
00331 
00332       setup ( fid );
00333 
00334       // check type matching
00335       if ( type() > 5 ) {
00336         throw Exception ( "This template doesn't support the give type TField<%s>.", tname ());
00337       } else if ( strcmp (typeid(this->value).name (), tname ()) != 0 ) {
00338         throw Exception ( "TField %s's value is of type %s and the FML table decalares a type %s.", name (), typeid(this->value).name (), tname());
00339       }
00340     }
00341 
00348     TField ( char *n ) {
00349 
00350       setup ( (FLDID32) Fldid32 ( n ) );
00351 
00352       // check type matching
00353       if ( strcmp (typeid(this->value).name (), tname ()) != 0 ) {
00354         throw Exception ( "TField value is of type %s and the FML table decalares a type %s for %s.", typeid(this->value).name (), tname(), name());
00355       }
00356     }
00357 
00358     virtual ~TField() {
00359     };
00360 
00363     virtual FLDLEN32 length () {
00364 
00365       return sizeof ( value );
00366     };
00367 
00374     T operator= ( T v) {
00375 
00376       value = v;
00377 
00378       return *this;
00379     };
00380 
00388     operator T(){
00389 
00390       return value;
00391     };
00392 
00393 protected:
00394 
00395     virtual int set ( Buffer *b) {
00396 
00397       int rc = -1;
00398 
00399       rc = Fchg32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), (char *) &value, length() );
00400       if ( rc < 0 ) {
00401         throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FCHG32 TField::set failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00402       }
00403 
00404       return rc;
00405     };
00406 
00407     virtual int add ( Buffer *b) {
00408 
00409       int rc = -1;
00410       try {
00411         if ( (needed () + b->used()) >= b->size()) {
00412           b->extend ();
00413         }
00414       } catch ( BufferException buffErr ) {
00415         throw  Exception ( "Add failed to estimate needed memory extension. Original message was : %s", buffErr.what() );
00416       };
00417 
00418       rc = Fadd32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), (char *) &value, length() );
00419       if ( rc < 0 ) {
00420         throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FADD32 TField::add failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00421       } else {
00422         setFocc ( (b->occurences ( this ) == 0 ? 0 : b->occurences ( this )-1));
00423       }
00424 
00425       return rc;
00426     };
00427 
00428     virtual int get ( Buffer *b ){
00429 
00430       return get ( b, occurence() );
00431     };
00432 
00433     virtual int get ( Buffer *b, FLDOCC32 occ ){
00434 
00435       int rc = -1;
00436       FLDLEN32 l = length();
00437       setFocc (occ);
00438 
00439       rc = Fget32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), (char *) &value, &l );
00440       if ( rc == -1 ) {
00441         throw BufferException (Ferror32, "FGET32 failed to get field %s (id: %d, occ: %d).", name(), id(), occurence() );
00442       }
00443 
00444       return rc;
00445     };
00446 
00447     T value;
00448   };

00454   template <> class TField<string>: public Field {
00455 public:
00456 
00463     TField ( FLDID32 fid ) {
00464 
00465       setup ( fid );
00466 
00467       // check taht we have a string declaration in the FML table
00468       if ( type () != 5 ) {
00469         throw Exception ( "TField %s's value is of type string and the FML table decalares a type %s.", name (), tname());
00470       }
00471     }
00472 
00479     TField ( char *n ) {
00480 
00481       setup ( (FLDID32) Fldid32 ( n ) );
00482 
00483       // check type matching
00484       if ( type() !=5 ) {
00485         throw Exception ( "TField value is of type string and the FML table decalares a type %s for %s.", tname(), name());
00486       }
00487     }
00488 
00489     virtual ~TField() {
00490     };
00491 
00494     virtual FLDLEN32 length () {
00495 
00496       return (FLDLEN32)value.length();
00497     };
00498 
00499     virtual TField<string> &operator= ( const char* v ) {
00500 
00501       value = v;
00502       return *this;
00503     };
00504 
00507     virtual TField<string> &operator= ( const string &v ) {
00508 
00509       value = v;
00510 
00511       return *this;
00512     };
00513 
00516     operator string(){
00517 
00518       return value;
00519     };
00520 
00521 
00522 protected:
00523 
00524     virtual int set ( Buffer *b) {
00525 
00526       int rc = -1;
00527 
00528       rc = Fchg32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), (char *) value.c_str(), length() );
00529       if ( rc < 0 ) {
00530         throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FCHG32 TField::set failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00531       }
00532 
00533       return rc;
00534     };
00535 
00536     virtual int add ( Buffer *b) {
00537 
00538       int rc = -1;
00539       if ( length () > 0 ) {
00540         try {
00541           if ( (needed () + b->used()) >= b->size()) {
00542             b->extend ();
00543           }
00544         } catch ( BufferException buffErr ) {
00545           throw  Exception ( "Add failed to estimate needed memory extension. Original message was : %s", buffErr.what() );
00546         };
00547 
00548         rc = Fadd32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), (char *) value.c_str(), length() );
00549         if ( rc < 0 ) {
00550           throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FADD32 TField::add failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00551         } else {
00552           setFocc ( (b->occurences ( this ) == 0 ? 0 : b->occurences ( this )-1));
00553         }
00554       } else {
00555         throw Exception ("Field %s's value is empty !!?? Cannot add an empty field value.", name ());
00556       }
00557 
00558       return rc;
00559     };
00560 
00561     virtual int get ( Buffer *b ){
00562 
00563       return get ( b, occurence() );
00564     };
00565 
00566     virtual int get ( Buffer *b, FLDOCC32 occ ){
00567 
00568       int rc = -1;
00569       FLDLEN32 l = 0;
00570       char *v = NULL;
00571       setFocc(occ);
00572 
00573       v = Fgetsa32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), &l );
00574       if ( v != NULL ) {
00575 
00576         rc=0;
00577         value = v;                      // copy v into string value
00578         delete v;
00579 
00580       } else {
00581         throw BufferException (Ferror32, "FGETSA32 TField::get failed to get field %s (id: %d, occ: %d).", name(), id(), occurence() );
00582       }
00583 
00584       return rc;
00585     };
00586 
00587     string value;
00588   };

00594   template <> class TField<char *>: public Field {
00595 public:
00596 
00603     TField ( FLDID32 fid ) : len (0), value (NULL) {
00604 
00605       setup ( fid );
00606 
00607       // check taht we have a string declaration in the FML table
00608       if ( type () != 6 ) {
00609         throw Exception ( "TField %s's value is of type carray and the FML table decalares a type %s.", name (), tname());
00610       }
00611     }
00612 
00619     TField ( char *n ) : len (0), value (NULL) {
00620 
00621       setup ( (FLDID32) Fldid32 ( n ) );
00622 
00623       // check type matching
00624       if ( type() != 6 ) {
00625         throw Exception ( "TField value is of type carray and the FML table decalares a type %s for %s.", tname(), name());
00626       }
00627     }
00628 
00629     virtual ~TField() {
00630 
00631       if ( value != NULL) delete[] value;
00632     };
00633 
00636     virtual FLDLEN32 length () {
00637 
00638       return len;
00639     };
00640 
00643     void setCarray ( const char * c, long s ) {
00644 
00645       if ( value == NULL ) delete value;
00646 
00647       len = s;
00648       value = new char [len];
00649       memcpy ( value, c, len );
00650     };
00651 
00670     virtual void getCarray ( char *carray, long size ) {
00671 
00672       memcpy ( carray, value, ( size < length () ? size : length() ) );
00673     };
00674 
00677     TField<char *> &operator= ( TField<char*> &carray ){
00678 
00679       setCarray ( carray.value, carray.len );
00680 
00681       return *this;
00682     };
00683 
00684 protected:
00685 
00686     virtual int set ( Buffer *b) {
00687 
00688       int rc = -1;
00689 
00690       rc = Fchg32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), value, length() );
00691       if ( rc < 0 ) {
00692         throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FCHG32 TField::set failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00693       }
00694 
00695       return rc;
00696     };
00697 
00698     virtual int add ( Buffer *b) {
00699 
00700       int rc = -1;
00701       if ( length () > 0 ) {
00702         try {
00703           if ( (needed () + b->used()) >= b->size()) {
00704             b->extend ();
00705           }
00706         } catch ( BufferException buffErr ) {
00707           throw  Exception ( "Add failed to estimate needed memory extension. Original message was : %s", buffErr.what() );
00708         };
00709 
00710         rc  = Fadd32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), value, length() );
00711         if ( rc < 0 ) {
00712           throw BufferException ( Ferror32, "FADD32 TField::add failed for field %s (id: %d, occ: %d)", name(), id(), occurence() );
00713         } else {
00714           setFocc ( (b->occurences ( this ) == 0 ? 0 : b->occurences ( this )-1));
00715         }
00716 
00717       } else {
00718         throw Exception ( "Field %s's value is empty !!?? Cannot add an empty field value.", name () );
00719       }
00720 
00721       return rc;
00722     };
00723 
00724     virtual int get ( Buffer *b ){
00725 
00726       return get ( b, occurence() );
00727     };
00728 
00729     virtual int get ( Buffer *b, FLDOCC32 occ ){
00730 
00731       int rc = -1;
00732       FLDLEN32 l = 0;
00733       setFocc(occ);
00734       char *v = NULL;
00735 
00736       v = Fgetalloc32 ( b->get_buffer(), id(), occurence(), &l );
00737       if ( v != NULL ) {
00738 
00739         len = l;
00740         if ( value != NULL ) delete[] value;
00741 
00742         value = new char[len];
00743         memcpy (value, v, len);
00744 
00745         rc = 0;
00746         delete[] v;
00747 
00748       } else {
00749         throw BufferException (Ferror32, "FGETSA32 TField::get failed to get field %s (id: %d, occ: %d).", name(), id(), occurence() );
00750       }
00751 
00752       return rc;
00753     };
00754 
00755     FLDLEN32 len;
00756     char    *value;
00757   };
